content.text: What is your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I like to sleep in. Do you have any hobbies?
I really like to make sure my nails look their best! I also love to cook, but I am not an expert at it. I try to make meals that my mom enjoys.
What is your favorite thing to cook? I used to lie to my parents about my grades, but now I'm more honest with them.
I like to make a lot of different dishes, but I really like making pasta. What is your favorite color?
My favorite color is blue. I love the way it looks on me. I am a pretty peaceful person, but I can hold my own if I need to.
Nice! My favorite colors are yellow and teal. I think they look really good together. Are you a morning person or a night owl?
I am a morning person. I like to wake up early and get a head start on my day. I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
That's cool! I am more of a night owl. I like to stay up late and watch movies. I do love the sunrise, though.
I love the sunrise, too! It is so beautiful. What do you do for a living
